attributes.review: It’s about a Cheeto looking man how thought taking a 13 year old girls virginity as a competition. He is also sexually attracted to his daughter since she was 13. This orange looking disgusting man should be in jail ✨💕 period

attributes.review: So I went to Taco Bell to grab a slurpee but then I see my orange across the street at ikea grow legs and turn into the Cheeto man trump!😳I was so horrified at the sight of the Cheeto man I fainted and woke up blind! This is a one star review 😤
attributes.title: it has made me blind
